channel.title: Things on coda.life
channel.description: Recent content in Things on coda.life

item.title: Books
item.description: RxJava for Android Developers If you were confused about Rx or RxJava, this book does a great job of a practical explanation. Its still in early access as of 12/20/17. Cracking the Coding Interview Found this book to be very useful, good example problems and content just for your own enjoyment of solving if your not interviewing. The Clean Coder Much good advice in here, if your interested in being more professional.
